Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery jar, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394180) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394180)
